long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Weezly allows to record one video and create thousands of personalized videos and send them to your potentials through lead gen tools such as Instantly, Smartlead, Lemlist and many more or through Heyreach. It allows you also to record your screen and send your video messages and at the same time book meetings. All in-one platform. 

With all bigger challenges to reach out to customers and get through the buzz and crowd, Weezly is your one stop solution to stand out with personalized videos.  

What Sets Weezly Apart?
There is simply not a single tool on the market except Weezly, where you can create personalized videos at scale, send them to potential customers, at the same time record your screen and book meetings in one single tool. You can now replace multiple tools and focus what really matters, to book more meetings and close more deals. 

Itâ€™s streamlined, professional, and offers a personal touch like never before.

Features That Empower You:
- Record one video, generate thousands of personalized ones
- Booking Page: Make yourself available on your terms. Share your unique booking page and let others schedule meetings based on your availability.
- Timeslot Picker: Simplify planning by letting your invitees pick a suitable time slot, eliminating the need for endless back-and-forth emails.
- Group Invite: Need to find a common time for a group? Propose multiple times and let your participants vote on a slot that's best for everyone.
- Website Widget: Elevate your website by embedding our unique video with a built-in booking feature. Engage and convert visitors instantly.
- Screencast: From quick tutorials to heartfelt messages, easily record high-quality videos directly from Weezly.
 - Screencast + Booking Page: Record a video message and place your booking page right next to it, allowing viewers to take immediate action.

Ready to redefine how you communicate and schedule? Bring the future to your browser. Install the Weezly Chrome Extension now and experience seamless integration like never before.
